fields.name: biospecimen_id
fields.title: Biospecimen ID
fields.description: Identifier for the Biospecimen

fields.name: parent_id
fields.title: Parent ID
fields.description: Parent Identifier from which the biospecimen was obtained. The parent could be another biospecimen or a research participant.

fields.name: adjacent_biospecimen_id
fields.title: Adjacent Biospecimen ID
fields.description: List of Identifiers (separated by commas) of adjacent biospecimens cut from the same sample

fields.name: biospecimen_type
fields.title: Biospecimen Type
fields.description: Biospecimen Type

fields.name: analyte_type
fields.title: Analyte Type
fields.description: Text term that represents the kind of molecular specimen analyte.

fields.name: protocol_link
fields.title: Protocol Link
fields.description: Identifier that describes the protocol by which the sample was obtained or generated. E.g. Protocols.io

fields.name: timepoint_label
fields.title: Timepoint Label
fields.description: Label to identify the time point at which the biospecimen was obtained.

fields.name: collection_days_from_index
fields.title: Collection Days From Index
fields.description: Number of days from the research participant's index date that the biospecimen was obtained.

fields.name: acquisition_method_type
fields.title: Acquisition Method Type
fields.description: Records the method of acquisition or source for the specimen under consideration.

fields.name: post_mortem_interval
fields.title: Post mortem Interval
fields.description: Number of days from the research participant's date of death that the biospecimen was obtained

fields.name: tumor_tissue_type
fields.title: Tumor tissue type
fields.description: Text that describes the kind of disease present in the tumor specimen as related to a specific time point.

fields.name: preservation_method
fields.title: Preservation method
fields.description: Text term that represents the method used to preserve the sample.

fields.name: fixative_type
fields.title: Fixative Type
fields.description: The field to identify the type of fixative used to preserve a tissue specimen

fields.name: fixation_duration
fields.title: Fixation Duration
fields.description: The length of time, from beginning to end, required to process or preserve biospecimens in fixative (measured in minutes)

fields.name: slide_charge_type
fields.title: Slide Charge Type
fields.description: A description of the charge on the glass slide.

fields.name: section_thickness_value
fields.title: Section Thickness Value
fields.description: Numeric value to describe the thickness of a slice to tissue taken from a biospecimen, measured in microns (um).

fields.name: days_to_sectioning
fields.title: Days to sectioning
fields.description: Number of days between the date of sample acquisition and the date that the specimen was sectioned

fields.name: storage_method
fields.title: Storage Method
fields.description: The method by which a biomaterial was stored after preservation or before another protocol was used.

fields.name: days_to_processing
fields.title: Days to processing
fields.description: Number of days between the date of sample acquisition and the date that the biospecimen was processed

fields.name: shipping_conditions
fields.title: Shipping Conditions
fields.description: Text descriptor of the shipping environment of a biospecimen.

fields.name: histology_assessments_by
fields.title: Histology Assessments By
fields.description: Text term describing who made the histological assessments of the sample

fields.name: histology_assessment_medium
fields.title: Histology Assessment Medium
fields.description: The method of assessment used to characterize histology

fields.name: tumor_infiltrating_lymphocytes
fields.title: Tumor infiltrating lymphocytes
fields.description: Number of tumor-infiltrating lymphocytes

fields.name: degree_of_dysplasia
fields.title: Degree of dysplasia
fields.description: Information related to the presence of cells that look abnormal under a microscope but are not cancer. Records the degree of dysplasia for the cyst or lesion under consideration.

fields.name: dysplasia_fraction
fields.title: Dysplasia fraction
fields.description: Information related to the presence of cells that look abnormal under a microscope but are not cancer. Records the degree of dysplasia for the cyst or lesion under consideration.

fields.name: number_proliferating_cells
fields.title: Number proliferating cells
fields.description: Numeric value that represents the count of proliferating cells determined during pathologic review of the sample slide(s).

fields.name: percent_necrosis
fields.title: Percent Necrosis
fields.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of cell death in a malignant tumor sample or specimen.

fields.name: percent_normal_cells
fields.title: Percent Normal Cells
fields.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of normal cell content in a malignant tumor sample or specimen.

fields.name: percent_stromal_cells
fields.title: Percent Stromal Cells
fields.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumor sample or specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc.

fields.name: percent_tumor_cells
fields.title: Percent Tumor Cells
fields.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by tumor cells in a sample.

fields.name: percent_tumor_nuclei
fields.title: Percent Tumor Nuclei
fields.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of tumor nuclei in a malignant neoplasm sample or specimen.

fields.name: fiducial_marker
fields.title: Fiducial marker
fields.description: Fiducial markers for the alignment of images taken across multiple rounds of imaging.

fields.name: mounting_medium
fields.title: Mounting medium
fields.description: The solution in which the specimen is embedded, generally under a cover glass. It may be liquid, gum or resinous, soluble in water, alcohol or other solvents and be sealed from the external atmosphere by non-soluble ringing media.

fields.name: slicing_method
fields.title: Slicing method
fields.description: The method by which the tissue was sliced.

fields.name: control
fields.title: Control
fields.description: Control tissue / area

fields.name: data_file_id
fields.title: Data File ID
fields.description: unique e.g., “self” HTAN ID for data file described by this metadata

fields.name: filename
fields.title: Filename
fields.description: name of data file as submitted to repository

fields.name: file_format
fields.title: File Format
fields.description: format of data file

fields.name: parent_id
fields.title: Parent ID
fields.description: Parent Identifier from which the biospecimen was obtained. The parent could be another biospecimen or a research participant.

fields.name: software_and_version
fields.title: Software and Version
fields.description: method(s) and parameters used for any acquisition/ transformation/ processing to create this image

fields.name: commit_sha
fields.title: Commit SHA
fields.description: Short SHA for software version (8 hexadecimal characters for github)

fields.name: comment
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Free text field to use if necessary

fields.name: header_size
fields.title: Header size
fields.description: How many columns do have in the CSV / FCS

fields.name: object_classes_included
fields.title: Object classes included
fields.description: Defines which cell compartment this mask pertains or which tissue structure

fields.name: object_classes_description
fields.title: Object classes description
fields.description: Free text description of object class

fields.name: fov_size_x
fields.title: FOV Size X
fields.description: FOV size in X-dimension (micron)

fields.name: fov_size_y
fields.title: FOV Size Y
fields.description: FOV size in Y-dimension (micron)

fields.name: pyramid
fields.title: Pyramid
fields.description: whether or not image file contains a pyramid stack

fields.name: z_stack
fields.title: Z stack
fields.description: whether or not image file contains a Z-stack

fields.name: t_series
fields.title: T series
fields.description: whether or not image file contains a time series

fields.name: type
fields.title: Type
fields.description: bit depth of image

fields.name: physical_size_x
fields.title: Physical Size X
fields.description: physical size of one pixel in x-dimension

fields.name: physical_size_xunit
fields.title: Physical Size XUnit
fields.description: unit for PhysicalSizeX

fields.name: physical_size_y
fields.title: Physical Size Y
fields.description: physical size of one pixel in y-dimension

fields.name: physical_size_yunit
fields.title: Physical Size YUnit
fields.description: unit for PhysicalSizeY

fields.name: physical_size_z
fields.title: Physical Size Z
fields.description: physical size of one pixel in Z-dimension

fields.name: physical_size_zunit
fields.title: Physical Size ZUnit
fields.description: unit for PhysicalSizeZ

fields.name: cell_state_level
fields.title: Cell state level
fields.description: Are cell types / states included?

fields.name: data_file_id
fields.title: Data File ID
fields.description: unique e.g., “self” HTAN ID for data file described by this metadata

fields.name: filename
fields.title: Filename
fields.description: name of data file as submitted to repository

fields.name: file_format
fields.title: File Format
fields.description: format of data file

fields.name: parent_id
fields.title: Parent ID
fields.description: Parent Identifier from which the biospecimen was obtained. The parent could be another biospecimen or a research participant.

fields.name: protocol_ids
fields.title: Protocol ID(s)
fields.description: unique identifier (e.g. protocols.io) -- may be a delimited list of identifiers

fields.name: software_and_version
fields.title: Software and Version
fields.description: method(s) and parameters used for any acquisition/ transformation/ processing to create this image

fields.name: comment
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Free text field to use if necessary

fields.name: header_size
fields.title: Header size
fields.description: How many columns do have in the CSV / FCS / hdf5

fields.name: possible_cell_type_states_format
fields.title: Possible cell type / states format
fields.description: A semicolon-delimited list of possible keywords that each cell will be annotated with

fields.name: cell_type_clustering_calling_methods
fields.title: Cell type clustering / calling methods
fields.description: Methods used (connected to protocols.io) (for example PhenoGraph, k-means, etc.)

fields.name: algorithm_parameters
fields.title: Algorithm parameters
fields.description: Description of algorithm parameters

fields.name: channel_id
fields.title: Channel ID
fields.description: this must match the corresponding field in the OME-XML / TIFF header

fields.name: channel_name
fields.title: Channel Name
fields.description: this must match the corresponding field in the OME-XML / TIFF header

fields.name: cycle_number
fields.title: Cycle Number
fields.description: the cycle # in which the co-listed reagent(s) was(were) used

fields.name: sub_cycle_number
fields.title: Sub Cycle #
fields.description: sub-cycle #

fields.name: target_name
fields.title: Target name
fields.description: short descriptive name (abbreviation) for this target (antigen)

fields.name: antibody_name
fields.title: Antibody Name
fields.description: short descriptive name for this antibody

fields.name: rrid_identifier
fields.title: RRID identifier
fields.description: Research Resource Identifier

fields.name: fluorophore
fields.title: Fluorophore
fields.description: Fluorescent dye label

fields.name: clone
fields.title: Clone
fields.description: Unique clone identifier

fields.name: lot
fields.title: Lot
fields.description: lot number from vendor

fields.name: vendor
fields.title: Vendor
fields.description: Vendor name

fields.name: catalog_number
fields.title: Catalog #
fields.description: catalog number from vendor

fields.name: excitation_wavelength
fields.title: Excitation wavelength
fields.description: center/peak of the excitation spectrum (nm)

fields.name: emission_wavelength
fields.title: Emission wavelength
fields.description: center/peak of the emission spectrum (nm)

fields.name: excitation_bandwidth
fields.title: Excitation bandwidth
fields.description: nominal width of excitation spectrum (nm)

fields.name: emission_bandwidth
fields.title: Emission bandwidth
fields.description: nominal width of emission spectrum (nm)

fields.name: metal_isotope_element
fields.title: Metal isotope: Element
fields.description: Element abbreviation

fields.name: metal_isotope_mass
fields.title: Metal isotope: Mass
fields.description: Element mass number

fields.name: oligo_barcode_upper_strand
fields.title: Oligo barcode: upper strand
fields.description: DNA barcode used for labeling

fields.name: oligo_barcode_lower_strand
fields.title: Oligo barcode: lower strand
fields.description: DNA barcode used for labeling

fields.name: dilution
fields.title: Dilution
fields.description: Final dilution ratio used in experiment

fields.name: concentration
fields.title: Concentration
fields.description: Final concentration used in experiment

fields.name: passed_qc
fields.title: Passed QC
fields.description: Identify stains that did not pass QC but are included in the dataset.

fields.name: qc_details
fields.title: QC details
fields.description: Comment on why QC failed

fields.name: comment
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Free text field to use if necessary

fields.name: participant_id
fields.title: Participant ID
fields.description: Participant Identifier

fields.name: species
fields.title: Species
fields.description: Text that identifies species of tissue sample.

fields.name: ethnicity
fields.title: Ethnicity
fields.description: Text designations that identify ethnicity.

fields.name: gender
fields.title: Gender
fields.description: Text designations that identify gender.

fields.name: race
fields.title: Race
fields.description: Text designations that identify race.

fields.name: vital_status_at_last_follow_up
fields.title: Vital status at last follow up
fields.description: The survival state of the person at the last follow up contact.

fields.name: year_of_death
fields.title: Year of death
fields.description: Numeric value to represent the year of the death of an individual.

fields.name: cause_of_death
fields.title: Cause of death
fields.description: Text term to identify the cause of death for a patient.

fields.name: days_to_death
fields.title: Days to death
fields.description: Age at the time of death expressed in the number of days since birth.

fields.name: age_at_diagnosis
fields.title: Age at diagnosis
fields.description: Age at the time of diagnosis expressed in the number of days since birth.

fields.name: known_genetic_predisposition_mutation
fields.title: Known genetic predisposition mutation
fields.description: A yes/no/unknown indicator to identify whether there is a known genetic predisposition mutation present in the patient.

fields.name: hereditary_cancer_predisposition_syndrome
fields.title: Hereditary cancer predisposition syndrome
fields.description: Inherited genetic predisposition syndrome that confers heightened susceptibility to cancer in the patient.

fields.name: primary_diagnosis
fields.title: Primary diagnosis
fields.description: Text term used to describe the patient's histologic diagnosis.

fields.name: morphology
fields.title: Morphology
fields.description: Histologic Morphology Code based on International Classification of Diseases 10th Edition.

fields.name: site_of_resection_or_biopsy
fields.title: Site of resection or biopsy
fields.description: The text term used to describe the anatomic site of origin, of the patient's disease.

fields.name: tissue_or_organ_of_origin
fields.title: Tissue or organ of origin
fields.description: The text term used to describe the anatomic site of origin, of the patient's disease.

fields.name: classification_of_tumor
fields.title: Classification of tumor
fields.description: Text that describes the kind of disease present in the tumor specimen as related to a specific time point.

fields.name: prior_treatment
fields.title: Prior treatment
fields.description: Yes/no/unknown indicator related to the administration of therapeutic agents received before the body specimen was collected.

fields.name: days_to_last_follow_up
fields.title: Days to last follow up
fields.description: Time interval from the date of last follow up to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

fields.name: last_known_disease_status
fields.title: Last known disease status
fields.description: Text term that describes the last known state or condition of an individual's neoplasm.

fields.name: days_to_last_known_disease_status
fields.title: Days to last known disease status
fields.description: Time interval from the date of last follow up to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

fields.name: progression_or_recurrence
fields.title: Progression or recurrence
fields.description: Yes/No/Unknown indicator to identify whether a patient has had a new tumor event after initial treatment.

fields.name: days_to_progression
fields.title: Days to progression
fields.description: Number of days between the date of the patient’s first diagnosis and the date the patient's disease progressed.

fields.name: days_to_progression_free
fields.title: Days to progression free
fields.description: Number of days between the date used for index (DOB) and the date the patient’s disease was formally confirmed as progression-free.

fields.name: tumor_grade
fields.title: Tumor grade
fields.description: Numeric value to express the degree of abnormality of cancer cells, a measure of differentiation and aggressiveness.

fields.name: pack_years_smoked
fields.title: Pack years smoked
fields.description: Numeric computed value to represent lifetime tobacco exposure defined as number of cigarettes smoked per day x number of years.

fields.name: years_smoked
fields.title: Years smoked
fields.description: Numeric value to represent the number of years a person has been smoking.

fields.name: gene_symbol
fields.title: Gene symbol
fields.description: The text term used to describe a gene targeted or included in molecular analysis. For rearrangements, this is should be used to represent the reference gene. Note: This node is meant to capture molecular tests that were completed clinically for the participant and only includes data from diagnostic array that was completed prior to research sequencing was done. Do not include data related to research assay outputs here.

fields.name: molecular_analysis_method
fields.title: Molecular analysis method
fields.description: The text term used to describe the method used for molecular analysis. Note: This node is meant to capture molecular tests that were completed clinically for the participant and only includes data from diagnostic array that was completed prior to research sequencing was done. Do not include data related to research assay outputs here.

fields.name: test_result
fields.title: Test result
fields.description: The text term used to describe the result of the molecular test.

fields.name: treatment_type
fields.title: Treatment type
fields.description: Text term that describes the kind of treatment administered.

fields.name: initial_disease_status
fields.title: Initial disease status
fields.description: Text term used to describe the status of the patient’s malignancy when the treatment began.

fields.name: therapeutic_agents
fields.title: Therapeutic agents
fields.description: Text identification of the individual agents used as part of a treatment regimen.

fields.name: days_to_follow_up
fields.title: Days to follow up
fields.description: Number of days between the date of sample acquisition and the date of the patient's last follow-up appointment or contact.

fields.name: lost_to_follow_up
fields.title: Lost to follow up
fields.description: Yes/No/Unknown indicator to identify whether a patient was lost to follow up.

fields.name: data_file_id
fields.title: Data File Id
fields.description: unique e.g., “self” HTAN ID for data file described by this metadata

fields.name: filename
fields.title: Filename
fields.description: name of data file as submitted to repository

fields.name: file_format
fields.title: File Format
fields.description: format of data file

fields.name: channel_level_metadata_csv_filename
fields.title: Channel Level Metadata Csv Filename
fields.description: “companion” CSV file containing channel-level metadata for multi-channel/multi-cyclic methods

fields.name: imaging_modality
fields.title: Imaging modality
fields.description: imaging technology

fields.name: assay_type
fields.title: Assay Type
fields.description: method / technology used

fields.name: protocol_ids
fields.title: Protocol Id(S)
fields.description: unique identifier (e.g. protocols.io) -- may be a delimited list of identifiers

fields.name: acquisition_software
fields.title: Acquisition software
fields.description: method(s) and parameters used for any acquisition/ transformation/ processing to create this image

fields.name: image_acquisition_date
fields.title: Image Acquisition Date
fields.description: The date of image acquisition

fields.name: microscope
fields.title: Microscope
fields.description: Microscope type (manufacturer, model, etc) used for this experiment

fields.name: objective
fields.title: Objective
fields.description: objective lens used (descriptor or other identifier)

fields.name: nominal_magnification
fields.title: Nominal Magnification
fields.description: nominal optical magnification

fields.name: lens_na
fields.title: Lens NA
fields.description: lens numerical aperture

fields.name: working_distance
fields.title: Working Distance
fields.description: distance from objective to coverslip

fields.name: working_distance_unit
fields.title: Working Distance Unit
fields.description: default = microns

fields.name: immersion_medium
fields.title: Immersion Medium
fields.description: the imaging medium affects the working NA of the objective

fields.name: comment
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Free text field to use if necessary

fields.name: frame_averaging
fields.title: Frame Averaging
fields.description: Number of frames averaged together (if no averaging, set to 1)

fields.name: fov_number
fields.title: Fov Number
fields.description: Index of FOV (as it pertains to its place in the Experiment)

fields.name: fov_sizex
fields.title: Fov Sizex
fields.description: FOV size in X-dimension (micron)

fields.name: fov_sizey
fields.title: Fov Sizey
fields.description: FOV size in Y-dimension (micron)

fields.name: pyramid
fields.title: Pyramid
fields.description: whether or not image file contains a pyramid stack

fields.name: z_stack
fields.title: Z Stack
fields.description: whether or not image file contains a Z-stack

fields.name: t_series
fields.title: T Series
fields.description: whether or not image file contains a time series

fields.name: image_id
fields.title: Image ID
fields.description: unique internal Image identifier

fields.name: pixels_big_endian
fields.title: Pixels Big Endian
fields.description: whether big endian byte order is used

fields.name: dimension_order
fields.title: Dimension Order
fields.description: internal ordering of dimensions

fields.name: physical_size_x
fields.title: Physical Size X
fields.description: physical size of one pixel in x-dimension

fields.name: physical_size_xunit
fields.title: Physical Size XUnit
fields.description: unit for PhysicalSizeX

fields.name: physical_size_y
fields.title: Physical Size Y
fields.description: physical size of one pixel in y-dimension

fields.name: physical_size_yunit
fields.title: Physical Size YUnit
fields.description: unit for PhysicalSizeY

fields.name: physical_size_z
fields.title: Physical Size Z
fields.description: physical size of one pixel in z-dimension

fields.name: physical_size_zunit
fields.title: Physical Size ZUnit
fields.description: unit for PhysicalSizeZ

fields.name: size_c
fields.title: Size C
fields.description: number of channels

fields.name: size_t
fields.title: Size T
fields.description: number of time-points

fields.name: size_x
fields.title: Size X
fields.description: number of pixels in x-dimension

fields.name: size_y
fields.title: Size Y
fields.description: number of pixels in y-dimension

fields.name: size_z
fields.title: Size Z
fields.description: number of z-planes

fields.name: type
fields.title: Type
fields.description: data type for each pixel value

fields.name: plane_count
fields.title: Plane Count
fields.description: total number of planes in this Image

fields.name: channel_name
fields.title: Channel Name
fields.description: channel label for each channel in this image

fields.name: comment
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Free text field to use if necessary

fields.title: Data Type
fields.description: Specify if OME-TIFF provided is a segmentation mask or QC-checked image

fields.description: unique identifier (e.g. protocols.io) -- may be a delimited list of identifiers

fields.description: method(s) and parameters used for any quality control, transformation, and visualization to create this image

fields.title: Commit SHA
fields.description: Short SHA for software version (8 hexadecimal characters for github)

fields.description: did all masks pass QC

fields.description: Defines if the mask delineates nucleus, the cytoplasm, plasma membrane, the whole cell or other
